description: This file sets up an agent using the agno framework to query stock prices via yfinance tools, and executes a specific query to retrieve stock prices for NVDA and TSLA.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with language models and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response stream from the agent run.

classes.name: LangDB
classes.description: Language database model used as the agent's core model.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool wrapper for yfinance to fetch stock data.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent for a given query.
